article_title: GOP primary: U.S. Rep. Virginia Foxx faces Pattie Curran
article_text:

og.description: Republican and unaffiliated voters in the 5th Congressional District will decide June 7 whether a woman who has never been elected to public office should potentially replace a woman who first won the GOP nomination, and the district, nearly 12 years ago.
og.title: GOP primary: U.S. Rep. Virginia Foxx faces Pattie Curran
